text: Here , using the murine B-cell lymphoma cell line A20 , we show that the <extra_id_0> TNF-alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene is regulated in a cell-type - specific manner .

text: Consistent with these results , quantitative DNase footprinting of the <extra_id_0> TNF-alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter using increasing amounts of recombinant <extra_id_0> NFATp <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> demonstrated that the -76 site binds to <extra_id_0> NFATp <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> with a higher affinity than the kappa 3 site .
